data.text: @SenLummis @SenWestCaucus Imagine if we could develop a system that uses the heat from home Bitcoin miners to distillate well water.  I'm thinking if you were to put the system under vacuum the boiling point of water would drop allowing the use of lower temperatures.
@SenLummis Looks solid 🔥 Let’s connect and collaborate 🤝
@SenLummis Just following up, would love to hear your thoughts on collaborating 😊

@SenLummis Good. Reliable water access in rural communities depends on long‑term infrastructure planning, sustainable funding, and systems that can withstand changing conditions. Ensuring every community has dependable service requires steady investment and clear operational standards.
